summary: An elderly amusement park maintenance man, Eddie, is trapped in purgatory and the only way out is to confront five people from his past. Unfortunately, dark secrets from his service in the Philippines begin to haunt him.
cast: Jon Voight|Ellen Burstyn|Jeff Daniels|Dagmara Dominczyk|Steven Grayhm|Michael Imperioli|Callum Keith Rennie|Rebecca Jenkins|Callahan Brebner|Nicaela Weigel|Shelbie Weigel|Darcy Cadman|Tim O'Halloran|Zak Santiago|Emy Aneke|Elias Toufexis|Billy Wickman|Kett Turton|Ava Hughes|Hiro Kanagawa|Taku Kawai|Pablo Coffey|Janine Sabino-Albom|Adiam Haddish Asrat|Leyla Bahmanyar|Stirling Bancroft|Kerry Blouin|Alain Chanoine|Anthony De Marco|Kurt Doss|Tammie Eros|Alex Ferris|Damon Johnson|Pam McCartney|Megan McKinnon|Allie Mickelson|Matt Visser|Aaron Woods
title: Las cinco personas que conoces en el cielo
